data.title: Malibu Home Coming Up for Sale Aims for Record $300 Million
data.meta_description: California billionaires are looking past the beach town’s fire risks to send real estate values to new heights
data.text:
Along the shores of Malibu, sales of lavish mansions for celebrities and California’s wealthy elite are toppling real estate records.

A 9.5-acre oceanfront estate sold in June for $210 million, the most ever for a California residence. It surpassed the high mark set just last year by superstars Beyoncé and Jay-Z, who paid $190 million for a sprawling Malibu compound. Nearby is a home purchased in 2021 by Silicon Valley luminaries Marc Andreessen and Laura Arrillaga-Andreessen for $177 million, a state record at the time.
